Tags.Description: Binary volume where each voxel's value can be either 0 or 1.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Mask

Tags.Description: Each voxel contains an integer representing its region.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Label

Tags.Description: Each non-zero voxel encodes its distance to the closest zero-valued voxel.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Distance

Tags.Description: Segmented volume with a three-dimensional grid of chords running through it along all axes.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Chord
